attributes.action: End Forced Adoptions and stop paying government authorities, Social Services, Cafcass,to steal children from innocent parents for financial incentives at tax payers expense. End corruption.PLEASE Mr.Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of families have been wrongly accused of child abuse and have been rairoaded by the corrupt UK Family Court system, in secret, help to put an end to the theft of our children for Forced Adoptions just so that professionals can make money. We are not your slaves Mr.Brown and our children are NOT commodities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
